column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Hi Crystal - Thank you for your review. Please know that if you're ever dissatisfied with our food for any reason whatsoever
column2: just let your server know and he or she will make sure to remake the item
column4: or remove it from your tab. We're never going to be all things to all people in terms of food
column6: but we strive to make sure everyone leaves our doors happy
column8: very least satisfied. For what it's worth
column9: our Tokyo Curry Ramen is an authentic version of Japanese curry
column10: which is vastly different than Indian curry or Thai curry.
